properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 10:41AM EST until February 6 at 9:24PM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued
a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

The Kentucky River at Whitesburg
The North Fork Kentucky River at Hazard
The South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida
The South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville
The Kentucky River at Heidelberg

The National Weather Service in Jackson Kentucky has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The South Fork Kentucky River at Oneida.
* until this evening.
* at 7:15 AM Thursday the stage was 24.7 feet.
* Flood stage is 29.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage by
late this morning and continue to rise to near 30.2 feet by
this afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage by late
this afternoon.
* At 29.0 feet...Low lying areas flood, several feet of water
covering the track area behind the Oneida Baptist Institute and
water is across the road in front of Town Market .
properties.instruction:
A Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or is imminent.

Continue to monitor NOAA weather radio or your favorite local media
outlet for additional information. If you are in areas affected by
this forecast take necessary precautions.

The next update will be issued by 4 PM EST.
